src:
Apa yang Salah dengan Ousmane Dembele di Barcelona?
05 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Karier Ousmane Dembele di Barcelona selalu dinaungi awan gelap ketidakjelasan. Ada banyak kontroversi tentang Dembele dalam dua setengah tahun terakhir, yang terus berlanjut sampai musim ini.
Dembele tidak masuk dalam skuad Barca yang takluk 1-3 di hadapan Levante akhir pekan lalu. Keputusan ini jelas mengejutkan, Ernesto Valverde tidak menjelaskannya dengan gamblang.
Penyerang muda Prancis ini sebenarnya sudah menuntaskan hukuman larangan bermain pada dua pertandingan. Dia pun terlihat tersenyum lebar pada sesi latihan sebelum duel melawan Levante tersebut.
Kejutan muncul ketika Barca mengumumkan daftar skuad, Dembele absen. Sejak awal klub menegaskan absennya Dembele karena keputusan teknis, bukan masalah medis.
Biar begitu, absennya Dembele ini ternyata melahirkan banyak pertanyaan. Mengapa? Mengutip Sport, baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
What's Wrong with Ousmane Dembele in Barcelona?
05 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ousmane Dembele's career in Barcelona is always shaded by a dark cloud of obscurity. There has been a lot of controversy about Dembele in the past two and a half years, which continues until this season.
Dembele was not included in the Barca squad that was defeated 1-3 before Levante last weekend. This decision was clearly surprising, Ernesto Valverde did not explain it clearly.
The young French striker has actually completed a penalty of prohibition on playing in two matches. He was seen smiling broadly in the training session before the duel against Levante.
The surprise came when Barca announced the squad list, Dembele was absent. From the beginning the club confirmed the absence of Dembele because of technical decisions, not medical problems.
Even so, the absence of Dembele apparently gave birth to many questions. Why? Citing Sport, read more below, Bolaneters!
